issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Launcher icons in 3 sizes that are put into the platform/android/res/drawable-DENSITY folders (e.g. drawable-mdpi, drawable-ldpi, drawable-hdpi) are never used as launcher icons when the app is installed on an Android device.  Ti Studio forces you to specify a program icon in the tiapp.xml Overview page, and that icon file has to be in the Resources directory (you get an i/o error 2 if there is no icon in the Resources dir).  Titanium apps are using the Resources copy of the icon for everything.

Q&A entry here: http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/124701/launcher-icons---how-to-get-titanium-to-correctly-use-the-right-size
fields.summary: Launcher Icons: density specific icons are never used (Android)
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio 1.0.2.201107130739
Titanium SDK 1.7.2, 1.7.3.v.xxxxx, 1.8.0.v.xxxxx
Windows (XP, Vista, 7)

comments.body:
Shawn

Thank you for this ticket. Would you please provide [a Test Case|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report#HowtoSubmitaBugReport-CreatingaTestCase] to prove the bug, and to test it when it's resolved? Although I would ordinarily request it to be added to the body of the ticket, as the issue relates to assets, it's probably best to add it as a archived project.

Would you also check this ticket against [How to Submit a Bug Report|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report] to verify that you have included all the rest of the necessary information (for example, the copied and pasted exception).

I will resolve this ticket for the moment - please reopen to update it. Once the information is provided, I can move it to the main project.

Thanks in advance

Closing due to inactivity. If this issue still exists, please raise a new ticket, including all the information in the [JIRA Ticket Checklist|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report#HowtoSubmitaBugReport-JIRATicketChecklist] to ensure that we can escalate it quickly. Read [How to Submit a Bug Report|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report] if you have not read it before, and always start a ticket using the [JIRA Ticket Template|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/JIRA+Ticket+Template].

Thanks in advance
